uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model

Class CExtender

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.CExtender

  • public class CExtender
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for the definition of and subsequent creation of an extension-frame (see CFrameCategory.extension()) that extends a particular atomic-frame (see CFrameCategory.atomic()).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CExtender(CFrame baseFrame)
      Constructor for defining an extension-frame with a default label that provides a description of the extension.
      CExtender(CFrame baseFrame, java.lang.String label)
      Constructor for defining an extension-frame with the specified label.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Adds a fixed slot-value for the extension-frame.
      CFrame extend()
      Creates the required extension-frame.
      void setConcreteExtension(boolean concrete)
      Used to specify whether the extension should be "concrete", rather than abstract (see CFrame).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CExtender

        public CExtender(CFrame baseFrame)
        Constructor for defining an extension-frame with a default label that provides a description of the extension.
        Parameters:
        baseFrame - Atomic-frame to be extended
        Throws:
        uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.KAccessException - if specified base-frame is not an atomic-frame

      • CExtender

        public CExtender(CFrame baseFrame,
                 java.lang.String label)
        Constructor for defining an extension-frame with the specified label.
        Parameters:
        baseFrame - Atomic-frame to be extended
        label - Label for extension-frame
        Throws:
        uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.KAccessException - if specified base-frame is not an atomic-frame

    • Method Detail

      • setConcreteExtension

        public void setConcreteExtension(boolean concrete)
        Used to specify whether the extension should be "concrete", rather than abstract (see CFrame). By default the extension will be abstract.
        Parameters:
        concrete - True if extension is to be concrete

      • addSlotValue

        public void addSlotValue(CIdentity slotId,
                         CValue<?> value)
        Adds a fixed slot-value for the extension-frame.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Identity of relevant slot
        value - Relevant value

      • extend

        public CFrame extend()
        Creates the required extension-frame.
        Returns:
        Created extension-frame, or just the base-frame if no slot-values have been specified
